pr_title: add support for partial update/remove for tensor and map

timeline.message: add support for partial update tensor and map

timeline.bodyText:
I think this line is for debugging.
Remove this.
timeline.author: leisureshadow
leisureshadow

timeline.bodyText:
Can we separate removeTensor and add/create into two method since they are quite different?
Since the common part is not much, two different purpose methods would be easier to read rather than a complex method with multiple functionalities.
timeline.author: leisureshadow

timeline.bodyText:
Can we merge isPartialOperation into writePartialUpdate?
The main purpose of isPartialOperation is to write assign to the output.
And the purpose of isPartialOperation is to check it's a partial operation and write the operation to the output.
I think the purpose of these two method is alike.
It's better to write the same purpose code into same place.
timeline.author: leisureshadow

timeline.bodyText:
can we check it's a partial operation first, then generate the field name according to its data type?
currently, u specifically check it's a remove/add _bag_as_map_fields, then transform the bag to field name directly.
It'll be more general to depend on data type than on field name.
timeline.author: leisureshadow

replies.bodyText: per discussion, cannot merge writeMapPartialUpdate into writePartialUpdate method because we have to generate special key name of map partial update fields.
replies.author: leisureshadow

timeline.bodyText:
From pig user perspective, remove/add-bag-as-map-fields may be confused.
Users need to know that there is a functionality to transform bag as map.
Then he/she may know that these two feature is to add/remove a data in map.
Most of the pig users don't need to know the detail of this Java UDF.
It's better to rename them so that pig users would understand what are these for easily.
timeline.author: leisureshadow

timeline.bodyText: Don't comment out this line. This bug should be fixed in other PR.
timeline.author: leisureshadow

timeline.bodyText:
Suggest to merge this two condition into one method.
Like the one, shouldWritePartialUpdate.
timeline.author: leisureshadow

timeline.bodyText: Extract line 228~257 into a new method. This could increase the readability of method, writeField.
timeline.author: leisureshadow

timeline.bodyText: Remove shouldWritePartialUpdate if-else because else won't be happen here.
timeline.author: leisureshadow

timeline.bodyText:
Suggest to change the condition of writing assign operation.
There are two type of partial update: 1. single field partial update 2. whole document partial update
The 1st one is decided by property. The 2nd one is decided by operation name and the depth.
It's better to change the logic to the operation name and the depth so that we know this assign is added because of whole document partial update.
timeline.author: leisureshadow
leisureshadow
leisureshadow

timeline.bodyText: we can break here to reduce some time.
timeline.author: leisureshadow
